short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome plug-in for sharing ⋅ discoveries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you preview an article in Chrome and find an interesting sentence or joke, you can use this plug-in to generate a share card image, which will not be as monotonous as plain text. Come and use it.A Chrome plug-in for sharing ⋅ discoveries.
usage：
Select the content, right-click, click "shard-card", select the theme to generate the card
